posts.name: Talya (she/her)
posts.cooked: yep. it‚Äôs pretty much looks like a story but not from people in your contacts but from public broadcasters you can follow.
WhatsApp just wants to force communities and channels onto users.
Hasn‚Äôt the EU lately forced WhatsApp to include an option to send messages via Signal?
@Lkunited, I don‚Äôt think that‚Äôs correct. It‚Äôs just being discussed, or there was some WhatsApp beta feature screenshot posted.
No, the EU has recognized WhatsApp as the market leader and therefore decreed that WhatsApp must also make other messangers accessible via itself

posts.name: (he/him)
posts.cooked: no, they‚Äôre basically requiring Whatsapp to open up itself to other messaging services, but it‚Äôs up to those services to make use of the opportunity.

posts.name: Jj
posts.cooked: Just a note, that Channels are not E2EE, not the contents or the presence on the groups. So Meta can keep tabs on all the activity and members there.
Main reason for not being E2EE is allowing past messages in the chat to be visible to new members. I also don‚Äôt think are supposed to be used for private messages.

In case there will ever be a WhatsApp channel to promote Signal, I have a question concerning the visibility of some information of channel members.

In the WhatsApp help center, it is mentioned that

‚ÄúAdmins can‚Äôt see your full phone number or profile name unless they have you saved as a contact.‚Äù (Sources: 1 2)

Note that it specifically says that the full phone number isn‚Äôt being shared, suggesting that at least part of members‚Äô phone numbers are visible to admins.

With regards to the profile name, the wording isn‚Äôt quite clear whether at least part of the name is shared with admins or it is not being shared at all.

For profile pictures, I understood that it depends on each member‚Äôs privacy settings whether admins can see the picture‚Äîe.g. admins who are not contacts can see one‚Äôs profile picture if visibility is set to ‚Äúeveryone‚Äù.

My question:

Is there anyone here who is a WhatsApp channel admin‚Äîor who knows a channel admin‚Äîwho could clarify exactly what and how much phone number and profile name information of channel members is being shared with admins?

I made this WhatsApp channel for Signal, I guess nobody looked it up, zero followers so far
It doesn‚Äôt have any posts!

WhatsApp.com

Signal private messenger | WhatsApp Channel

Signal private messenger WhatsApp Channel. Updates about (new) features in Signal messenger. Truly private chat and calls, since it's open-source and made by a non-profit which doesn't collect/track any of your data üëç New version released to stable...

Follow that and I‚Äôll tell you what I see as the admin of the channel.
